name: Phantom
nutshell: One day, a young girl named Xiao Jiu arrived at a guesthouse called Snow House. There, she met with five unique staffs. After learning of her situation, she decided to stay at the guesthouse while trying to recall her memory. As she spends her time at the place, her story slowly unfolds…

name: Id - The Greatest Fusion Fantasy
nutshell:
We find Chunwha in a world beyond his own… There he will struggle to find his own purpose among the many inhabitants of the new world including elves, dwarves, and even mages! As we watch him grow in strength and spirit, the manhwaga creates fascinating characters out of his companions and adversaries and moves past the simple concept of the antagonist vs the protagonist.
To find out what fate has in store for our hero, follow Id in a fantastic adventure, exploring a world where anything is possible!

name: The Chef - Shinsho
nutshell: The Chef is back with all new adventures, traveling as he did before, cooking, transforming people’s lives, and then moving on…

name: Akajiroi Koibito
nutshell: A lovely Christmas present.

name: Ezakike e Youkoso
nutshell: To fulfill their life long dream, Ezakike Shuu's parents left for Africa, leaving him in charge of his younger brothers. However, growing up without parents' guidance, the Ezakike brothers are often ill-treated and looked down upon. In order to protect his brothers, Shuu devotes his life to raise them filled with happy memories. However, a fated meeting with his new homeroom teacher would turn his life upside down…

name: THE iDOLM@STER - Umi no Matsu Uchi ni te (Doujinshi)
Chichi to Ko
nutshell: The unpredictable and wild son: Shou. The former gangster and current hands-on father who looks after him: You-san. Follow this lively father-and-son pair, as their days are sure to be eventful!

name: Alien in My Wardrobe
tags: Sci-Fi,Action,Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Office Workers,Web Comic,Aliens,Full Color
nutshell: "Hey you, Livestock, I need a subject for my alien probe" are not words Haesung expected to ever hear. He spends his days spacing out, hopelessly fantasizing about being tied up by his office crush, Shiwon. But his secret BDSM fantasies come to life as a brutally sexy alien crash-lands on Earth and ropes in Haesung as his research subject (and roommate). Things heat up when Haesung submits to the experiment—in exchange for sexual favors that are out of this world!

name: Like the Kudan
nutshell: Seven college students are coming back from their graduations. During the travel they are shocked to see a strange, cow-like creature with a human face. This accident means they only have seven days left to live. What will they do to stay alive until the fated day?

name: Cooperative Best Friend
nutshell: The story of a crossdressing boy and his best bro that plays along with his requests.

name: Kokuyou no Sheikh wa Ai o Sasayaku
nutshell: From AOC Translations: A political marriage proposal finds it's way to princess Lucia of the L'ignis Kingdom. Lucia absolutely adores the idea of 'fate' and 'destiny'. Her groom is the ruler of Ward Assahra, a wealthy desert country, Sheikh Afarzad. Lucia meets Afarzad for the first time at their lavish wedding, and falls in love immediately. However, much to Lucia's dismay, Afarzad only sees her as his 'possession' and not his wife…

name: Touhou - Yuyuko's Riddle (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Kaguya goes on an adventure to find the answer to Yuyuko's riddle, "something on Earth that is restored even should it rot."

name: Suizou ga Kowaretara, Sukoshi Iki Yasukunarimashita
nutshell:
"I wanted to take care of myself, so I stopped relying on alcohol."
The latest work by Kabi Nagata, who has been making a manga of her own actions and thoughts, is about her days of drinking and abstaining from alcohol during the corona crisis.

name: Concerto
Haikyuu!! - Ore to Osananajimi no Shoya ni Matsuwaru Arekore (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Iwaizumi Hajime/Oikawa Tooru
It’s been two months since Iwaizumi and Oikawa started dating, but they haven’t yet moved beyond kissing. However, when the perfect opportunity to finally do the do presents itself, there’s one matter left to be resolved: Who gets to top?

name: Slightly! Don Patch
nutshell: Following a similar narrative to its predecessor (Fuwari! Donpatch), Honnori! Donpatch is a slice of life involving Beauty living with Donpatch. Here, however, it is not a parody, but more a pastiche of Kiyohiko Azuma's beloved slice of life series Yostuba&!

name: Heavy × Beauty: Pretty Babies
nutshell:
In the middle of the night, Ibuki suddenly calls on his superior Kiriya. Both work at the Metropolitan Police Department and have been dating each other for the last three years. One day, Kiriya's uncle proposes to headhunt Ibuki, and talks of Kiriya's own arranged marriage introduction.
"Hmm, I guess it's high time." Kiriya sighs upon receiving a phone call from former bad company…

name: Kakugo no Susume - Oujou no Susume
nutshell: serialized in Weekly Shonen Champion No. 50 as one of the 40th anniversary commemorative projects.

name: Corp Shitsurakuen
nutshell:
A strange twist on the story of Adam and Eve. After eating the forbidden fruit, Adam and Eve are both ejected from the Garden of Eden and land in the modern world.
Where will this comedy series lead them?

name: Haikyuu!! - Hana no Iroha (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Bokuto Koutaro x Akaashi Keiji

name: Tarinai Jikan
nutshell:
Yousuke suddenly shows up on the door step of his old classmate Tanigawa, with whom he lost touch after high school. While the two had a budding relationship back in school, things fell apart and they decided to part ways and search for their true love. However, it might be that their relationship in the golden days of high school was what they have been looking for all along. Can they both figure out the meaning of true love that they never knew back then?
Life is like a cycle and so is love. What once was lost can turn full circle and be found once more. Shoko Hidaka's collection of eye-opening love stories also includes a coffee store owner that has to choose between his work and his love for an aspiring artist, and a public prosecutor who must hide his personal relationship with a detective from their working peers.
A second storyline involves Shibuya and Mikami, two of Tanigawa's students and a misunderstanding that threatens their relationship.
The story between Shibuya and Mikami continues at one of the chapters of Signal.

name: Twin Princesses
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
When opera diva Rei Mizumo falls in adulterous love with Richard, an English duke of the Conwall family, and is pregnant with his child, his childless wife Elisabeth tells Rei to hand over the child as the heir to the duke's family in exchange for forgiveness for their transgressions.
However, the child she gives birth to turns out to be twin sisters. Richard and Elisabeth decided in secret that the child named Michiru would be given to the duke and the child named Chiruchiru would be raised by Rei. Rei went to Japan first for work, and the jet carrying Chiruchiru was lost in the skies over Congo, Africa...!
Amidst the love-hate relationship between the twin sisters and their mother, who were separated by a strange fate, will Michiru and Chiruchiru ever meet again?

name: Ryoko's Case File
nutshell: The story revolves around Ryouko Yakushiji, a brilliant 27-year-old elite investigator with the Tokyo Metropolitan Police. Together with her subordinate Junichirou Izumida, the two often investigate bizzare and supernatural cases. In addition with the paranormal, Ryouko also has a longstanding rivalry with Yukiko Muromachi, another talented police investigator.

name: The girl I became friends with after lending each other H books
Kamidori
nutshell: The peerless chivalrous thief is finally caught!! The poor Goemon will be boiled in a pot!? The oneshot about the great thief who doesn't even fear the gods.  (From: MU)

name: Shiawase no Category
nutshell: Top reporter Tsuchiya writes a story that drives his friend to suicide, leaving his friend's son an orphan. The boy vanishes and Tsuchiya spends two years searching for him; while his own status as a reporter falls. When he finds the boy Fukuzawa he takes him in, without revealing his connection to the father, and tries to teach the lonely boy to rely on him. And perhaps to teach his own heart to rely on another as well…

name: Hisho no Oshigoto
nutshell:
Hisho no Oshigoto (Secretarial Work)
Haruto got a big promotion, unheard of in the Kagaya Group, to be the secretary of the 22-year-old vice president, Kagaya Yoshinari, just because he's the childhood friend of the newly-appointed VP. After 4 years without seeing each other, young Yoshinari grew into a surprisingly fine man. However, inside he's still the same old irritating brat. Upon their meeting, Yoshinari, using his authority as VP, immediately pursued Haruto to devote him his? virginity!!?


Unmei Kamoshirenai (Maybe This is Fate)
3-4. Unmei wa Itazura Kamoshirenai (Maybe This is Fate's Prank)


Aru Natsu no Ichinichi (A Summer Day)


Asu no Yukue (A Place for Tomorrow)


Tanshoku no Episode (A Faded Episode)

name: Rizelmine
nutshell:
The government has been conducting experiments to genetically engineer a human. Its first creation is a girl named Rizel, and the experiment is a success–sort of.
While healthy and cheerful, 12-year-old Rizel also possesses the uncanny need for love to further her development. Saddened by this emptiness in her life, she sheds tears that can end up destroying a city block.
So what's a girl to do … except get married! Enter Iwaki Tomonori, your average 15-year-old boy. His world is turned upside-down the day he arrives home to find that the government has just announced that he's a married man!

name: Nekokawaigari sa retai onnanoko
nutshell: Kyoko-san likes Kino-sama… maybe a little too much. To the point of stalking him everyday at school. One day She discovers his dirty little secret and uses this to become closer to him through blackmail. Together they will explore all sorts of antics in the search of understanding what it is to be a cat and master in a twisted and funny way.

name: Love is (Literally) War (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Artist twitter: https://twitter.com/JackTheFridge
Artist pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/707646
